thread.title: Darrell Smith
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Darrell Smith

author: Darrell Smith
title: Darrell Smith
text: I fondly remember my first order with B&H in 1982 when I ordered a Nikon F3 Camera body. I've had almost 30 orders in the past 34 years. NEVER a SINGLE problem with B&H. Dozens of camera bodies, lenses, binoculars, accessories since then . . . B&H are probably the best in the world, my forever "Go To" store almost a continent away from my home near Seattle, WA - For me, nearly 35 years of close, extremely reliable professional association! How do you beat that?
